Parametric Mix Display

Source: R/plots.R
param_mix_density_display.Rd

Display parametric mixture density in the MAP Prior Tab

Usage

param_mix_density_display(
  param_approx,
  select_analysis,
  saf_topic,
  select_btrt
)

Arguments

param_approx

map prior; best fitting mixture model from parametric_approx()

select_analysis

Incidence proportion or Exposure-adjusted AE rate

saf_topic

Selected safety topic to analyze/the adverse event of interest

select_btrt

selected background treatment
